snippet.title: Danball Senki/Little Battlers eXperience (PSP) High Quality Debut Trailer (Level-5 Vision 2008)
snippet.description:
This is the very first ever trailer shown of what is known as LBX: Little Battlers eXperience on 3DS in NA, shown WAY back at the Level-5 Vision event that was held in 2008 in Japan in high quality!

Time flies huh? :D
